ssot__ContactPointEmail__dlm.name: Contact Point Email
ssot__ContactPointEmail__dlm.description: The Contact Point Email DMO represents the email address of a party.

ssot__ActiveFromDate__c.description: The date the email address is active.

ssot__ActiveToDate__c.description: The date the email address is inactive.

ssot__BestTimeToContactEndTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to stop receiving emails.

ssot__BestTimeToContactStartTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to start receiving emails.

ssot__BestTimeToContactTimezone__c.description: The preferred timezone for the contact.

ssot__BestTimeToContactTimezoneId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact’s preferred time zone.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the contact point email DMO.

ssot__ContactPointTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the type of email, for example business or personal.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__EmailDomain__c.description: The domain of an email address, for example salesforce.com or gmail.com.

ssot__EmailLatestBouncedateTime__c.description: The date of the most recent email bounce.

ssot__EmailLatestBounceReasontext__c.description: The reason the email bounced, for example the mailbox was full.

ssot__EmailMailBox__c.description: The specific unique mailbox found before the domain, for example janedoe@.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__ForBusinessUse__c.description: An indicator if the email address is used for business use.

ssot__ForPersonalUse__c.description: An indicator if the email address is used for personal use.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator if the email address is active.

ssot__IsUndeliverable__c.description: An indicator if the email address is undeliverable.

ssot__IsVerified__c.description: An indicator if this contact point email is verified.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group. This ID is the same as the one used in the individual object.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__PreferenceRankNumber__c.description: The preference rank number for the contact point email.

ssot__PrimaryFlag__c.description: An indicator if the email address is the primary email address of the individual or account.

ssot__ProfileFirstCreatedDate___c.description: The date the profile was created.

ssot__ProfileLastUpdatedDate__c.description: The date the profile was last updated.

ssot__TimezoneCode__c.description: A single-character code indicating the time zone's relationship to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

ssot__UsageType__c.description: The usage type for the contact point email.
